Posts.Content: Nov 25, 2009 01:38AM lglavish wrote: Hang in there Peppi, I had excisional biopsies with wire localizations in both breasts yesterday morning.  I was awake for the localizations then they put me to sleep for the excisionals.  Don't be nervous it wasn't bad at all.  I'm a bit sore on the left but nothing a pain pill can't handle.  I was quite anxious in the days before surgery but I found if I stayed occuppied at work and home I was ok.  I should get the pathology on them back hopefully by tomorrow morning.  The one on the right came back negative after a core biopsy and the left was never biopsied prior to surgery although the doctor said my chances of negative in both are very high so I'm in good spirits.
Posts.Title: Need a 2nd biopsy now Peppi1 Peppi1
